name: orca-discord-bot
description: A Discord Bot that Hosts the Necessary Orca and OpenMPI Packages, can Run Orca Simulations through simple commands

scripts.framework: npm uninstall dna-discord-framework@experimental && npm uninstall dna-discord-framework && npm update && npm install dna-discord-framework
scripts.experimental: npm uninstall dna-discord-framework && npm uninstall dna-discord-framework && npm update && npm install dna-discord-framework@experimental
scripts.docker: npm run build && docker build -t mrdnalex/orcabot .
scripts.dockerpublish: npm run docker && docker login -u mrdnalex && docker push mrdnalex/orcabot
scripts.dockerstop: docker stop orcabot && docker rm orcabot
scripts.rundocker: npm run docker &&  docker rm -f orcabot && cls && docker run -it --name orcabot --restart=always --shm-size=100G -v C:\Users\MrDNA\Downloads\OrcaBind:/OrcaJobsArchive mrdnalex/orcabot

author: MrDNA
